No injection needed: Pfizer begins human trials of Covid pill to treat Coronavirus infection

Pfizer has begun early-stage human trials of a pill to treat the first signs of infection https://t.co/qHTUUxiRR0 #Covid19 #Covidpill #COVIDー19 #Covidtreatment #Treatment #Vaccine https://t.co/YgWMUcW4IL
